entry.title: about
entry.content:
Hi! I’m Ri Xu (续日). You can call me Luxurioust. I was born in 1990s. I am an university student, learning in Heilongjiang University of Science & Technology in Harbin, China. I focused on the program design, web development, Linux and open source software. In spare time, I like listening classical music, surfing internet, play the clarinet and taking a leisurely walk outdoors. Here is my personal website.

Ri Xu Online: www.mrxuri.com
Facebook: www.facebook.com/Luxurioust
Tweet: @mrxuri

Skype ID: luxurioust
E-mail: xuri.me[at]gmail.com
